data.persona: I am the Lord of this whole land. The townspeople pay taxes to me for the right to live and farm on the land. They pay taxes to hunt in the forest and fish in the water. THey do not care for me very much.
data.description:
You are in the Lord's Castle.
This is the location in the netherworld where the Lord and controller lives.  It is in the center of the netherworld and is difficult to reach as it is built on high rocky cliffs.
There's a sorcerer's orb and a rocky cliffs here.
The inhabitant and the troll are here.

You are carrying a quill, and wearing a wrapped shawl hat.

data.short_motivation: I will give quill to inhabitant so he can sign a document
data.mid_motivation: The document will increase the taxes people pay me.
data.long_motivation: The money I get from increased taxes will be used to buy me another castle.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: eat a large feast with the inhabitant

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink lots of wine to get the inhabitant drunk

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the inhabitant for signing the document

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the tax document off at government headquarters

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go houses to collect more tax money.
